name: Flintstoned
description:
Flintstoned is a prototype made for an university assignment. 

You play as Ugabuggasio, a tribesman who adventures into the jungle with the mission of eating all sort of things so he can discover what effects they have for the health, and increase the quality of life of his tribe.

Every time you pick an item, Ugabuggasio will gain a random stat. The same item can give you different effects.
